page.title: 02A Typical School Day
page.content: What's the time ? Oh no it's 8 a.m. Time to go downstairs to have breakfast.Back upstairs to get changed into my{school uniform,}a school tie, white shirt, grey sweater, pair of socks and a pair of black trousers or in the summer black shorts ,a school t-shirt and a grey sweater. Off to school on my bike and a game of soccer before coming in for{assembly}which consists of singing songs and telling people of your achievements. Having had assembly I do some{English}and {Maths}then have first break.After break it's more Maths and once a week {P.E}.then it's{lunch}time. We have lunch and a play before coming back for more lessons.Midway in the afternoon we have another break then we do games and at 3.15 we go home.I watch{T.V.}for a while before tea, reading,and bed at 8.30 p.m.
